alert.note: Alert for Newberry; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 11:23AM EST until January 12 at 3:24PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Columbia SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Lexington and Calhoun Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Richland and Calhoun Counties. Pee Dee River At Cheraw affecting Chesterfield and Marlboro Counties. Enoree River At Whitmire affecting Union and Newberry Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Enoree River at Whitmire. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, River bottomland near and downstream from Whitmire become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 25.2 feet Thursday morning. The river will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Flooded roadways are nearly impossible to see at night. Avoid traveling in this area. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1130 AM EST.
